ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.server.core

Class RequestContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.server.core.RequestContainer

  • public class RequestContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all requests for one user specified by the userId; It gets stored in the Neodatis object database
